description: Detects possible ransomware adding a custom extension to the encrypted files, such as ".jpg.crypted", ".docx.locky" etc.
name: Suspicious Appended Extension
query: ((OriginalFilename:(*.lnk OR *.rtf OR *.pst OR *.docx OR *.xlsx OR *.jpg OR *.jpeg OR *.png OR *.pdf) AND file.path.text:(*.lnk.* OR *.rtf.* OR *.pst.* OR *.docx.* OR *.xlsx.* OR *.jpg.* OR *.jpeg.* OR *.png.* OR *.pdf.*)) AND (NOT ((file.path.text:(*.tmp OR *.bak OR *.old OR *.orig OR *.backup OR *.temp)) OR (file.path.text:C\:\\ProgramData\\Anaconda3\\* AND file.path.text:*.c\~))))
author: frack113
